entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 9 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to 9 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
